channel.title: NPC Direction
channel.description: Hello Does anyone know how to change the direction of an NPC They always look to the left , can i change that ?

item.title: NPC Direction
item.dc:creator: @Gazmask Gazmask
item.description:
@Gazmask wrote:

[quote=“X-J-K-X, post:5, topic:156020”][quote author=Gazmask link=topic=212894.msg1859945#msg1859945 date=1193942533]
Hello
Does anyone know how to change the direction of an NPC
They always look to the left , can i change that ?
[/quote]

I just found out how to change Objects so thats prolly also gonna work for NPC’s
Hope its gonna work

I think it’s possible, yet i’ve seen no-one do it. So i don’t think so. You can change it client side. Yet i might be wrong again :… I don’t mess with clients much.[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: NPC Direction

[quote=“Gazmask, post:1, topic:156020”]Hello
Does anyone know how to change the direction of an NPC

I think it’s possible, yet i’ve seen no-one do it. So i don’t think so. You can change it client side. Yet i might be wrong again :… I don’t mess with clients much.
